events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the software engineer position with strong backend development experience.
The application has been categorized under the Engineering cluster based on keywords such as software engineer and development skills.
A recruiter has been assigned to manage the candidate's hiring process for the software engineer role.
The recruiter conducted an initial screening call to assess the candidate's technical background and enthusiasm for the software developer position.
The candidate responded promptly to the screening feedback, expressing eagerness to proceed to the next stage of interviews.
A technical interview has been scheduled with the engineering team for next week to evaluate coding skills and problem-solving abilities.
The candidate successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating strong expertise in backend system design and software development.
An HR interview has been scheduled to discuss company culture, benefits, and candidate expectations following the positive technical interview results.
The HR interview was completed successfully, with the candidate showing strong alignment with the company's values and employment terms.
An official job offer has been proposed to the candidate for the position of software engineer, including salary and benefits details.
The candidate provided positive feedback regarding the offer and expressed excitement about joining the engineering team.
The candidate officially accepted the offer to join the software engineering team, confirming start date and onboarding plans.
The candidate has started the onboarding process, including orientation sessions and initial setup for engineering tools access.
The recruitment process has been successfully closed after the candidate's smooth onboarding to the engineering department.
